review: I was very disappointed in this streaming device with access to a few games which appeared to be fun to play for the family. I am a great fan of my kindle products, and have been a prime member for many years so I thought I would try the fire tv.  I have a Roku 3 on a different tv and I am not sure if I was comparing it's ease of use or if it is just that poorly designed.Examples:  I wanted to find my amazon prime watch list, my Roku showed I had 38 items marked as favorites on the firetv showed I had 16. When I was looking for various movies to watch on the Roku for Prime it indicate 300 available but on the fire it showed 60.  I contacted FireTV customer service and the representative I talked to could not tell me why there was this difference in what I was seeing on firetv and the Roku.  I had other concerns on the fire and how it works (I am not very electronic oriented)  I like things to plug and go with little learning curve, but she could only answer 2 of the 4 questions to my satisfaction because I don't know or I'm not sure to me is not an answer.Sorry to say, I returned this item and ordered another roku 3
